welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sardinal, Costa Rica! Known for its stunning beaches and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flamingo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Flamingo Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daniel Oduber International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Daniel Oduber International Airport serves flights to and from other Central American countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamarindo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
